explanation: [0-0] A man holding a pink shark-shaped bottle opener is about to open a Coca-Cola bottle in front of him. He is wearing a white shirt and an orange vest, has short black hair, a pink straw behind his ear, and a blue-green wall and a yellow door behind him.

[0-3] He accidentally spills the Coke on the table in front of him, and a cartoon monster appears from the right side and walks towards the Coke on the table. The man is terrified and takes the straw from behind his ear and puts it into the Coke on the table.

[3-10] The cartoon monster continues to approach the Coke on the table, and the man sucks the Coke hard. After finally finishing it, he shows a relaxed expression, while the cartoon monster on the table roars angrily because it didn't get to drink the Coke.
